content: if you are looking for that extra special afghan look no further you have found it you can crochet cables a lovely cable design complete with step-by-step photos showing each step of making the cable tunisian crochet >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version nov 2015 re-worked and re-released
